name: Eye of the Big Brother
description:
Eye Of The Big Brother - game made for AI in Games Jam.

You are the Eye of the Big Brother. You need to get rid of drivers who don't obey traffic rules. There are two simple rules:

- Speed Limit 

- Traffic lights

Catch cars which drive too fast or cross red lights.

Use mouse to mark them.

Earn money for good catches, but be aware - wrong catch means waste of money! You are also losing money over time.

Try to make epic combos and destroy multiple roadhogs in series.

Unlock more eyes for money. Once you do that, switch eyes using arrow keys.

Controls: Mouse + Arrow Keys

authors: Maciej Celmer and Jacek Szymonek
